means: 指责的，侮辱的，傲慢无礼的

PerfectNetExp.abs: contumely n．无礼，傲慢contumelious adj．无礼的，傲慢的conundrum n．谜语
...见上contumely，傲慢无礼就是不服、顽固、倔强的。-acy是名词后缀，表示状态、性质。contumelious傲慢的、侮辱性的见上contumely，-ious（或-ous）是形容词后缀，表示具有、充满、倾向于。.
against little Adele: pushing her away with somecontumelious（侮辱的）epithet（骂人的话）

list.abs: I have read a sentence in an essay : even Yangjia are put to death , please don't use any contumelious words on him .在博友的文章中看到这样一句话:即使杨佳被判死刑，也不许用侮辱性的字眼。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Old French contumelieus, from Latin contumeliosus, from contumelia 'abuse, insult' (see contumely)
